articles.author: The Quint
articles.title: Asian Games 2023 Live Updates: 9 Medals on Day 13, India Win Gold in Hockey - The Quint
articles.description: Asian Games 2023 Day 13 Live Updates: India have so far won nine medals today. The men's hockey team won a gold medal by beating Japan by a 5-1 margin. Shuttler HS Prannoy finished his campaign with a bronze medal after losing to China’s Li Shifeng.
articles.content:
GOLD IN MEN'S HOCKEY!
India have reclaimed their lost crown, and in the most dominating manner plausible. The defending champions Japan were simply blown away by the juggernaut that hit them, as Har… [+210 chars]

articles.title: ‘Skyfalls’ On The West As Russia Declares Successful Test Of Nuclear-Powered Missile, Burevestnik Aka SSC-X-9 - EurAsian Times
articles.description: Amid the ongoing Ukraine conflict, Russian commentators and experts frequently issue threats regarding the potential deployment of the nuclear-powered torpedo called Poseidon against Western targets.
articles.content:
